actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 (82 Stat. 906) by designating a portion of the Colorado River, Colo., for study as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.

summary.text: Designates a portion of the Colorado River, Colorado, for study as a potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers sytem, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1276(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 (82 Stat. 906) by designating a portion of the Colorado River, Colo., for study as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.
